Articles.Content:
Are there any groups, Clans, Guilds or otherwise that I can join? I usually learn better from people rather than tutorials. If there are any groups that I can join I would greatly appreciate it : )

-Thing

Welcome aboard!

I'm not sure about groups/clans per se, but feel free to join us on the IRC at #kspofficial on irc.esper.net, you'll find lots of people willing to help you there.
As Cykyrios has stated, I'm not sure about groups or clans. But since you've said you learn better from people, feel free to private message me for any questions you have!

There's no such thing as guilds/clans here, but you'll find companies and corporations created by other players to collaborate and showcase their builds (though there's no such thing as companies in the actual game itself).

Welcome aboard!
